member.name: IMFSinkWriterCallback.OnFinalize
member.param: The status code for the operation. If the value is an error code, the output file might be invalid.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the sink writer ignores the return value.

member.name: IMFSinkWriterCallback.OnMarker
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream. This parameter equals the value of the dwStreamIndex parameter in the method.
The application-defined value that was given in the pvContext parameter in the method.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the sink writer ignores the return value.

member.name: IMFSinkWriterCallback
member.summary: Callback interface for the Microsoft Media Foundation sink writer.
